Adrian is a senior who has been writing for the Statesman since  PERIOD He has covered almost all of Stony Brooks DivisionI varsity teams as well as the schools DivisionI ACHA ice hockey team PERIOD He hopes to one day become a respected reporter and insider in the sports world PERIOD
Before coming to Stony Brook he played two years of varsity ice hockey at White Plains High School and the sport remains his favorite PERIOD He is also a member of Stony Brooks marching and pep band and is currently an intern for the Times Beacon Record PERIOD He enjoys watching and observing team sports of all kinds and continues to play hockey with his father over the summer PERIOD
